articles.title: India's June services activity shrinks at fastest rate in 11-months - Economic Times
articles.description: Asia's third largest economy, which has already recorded more than 400,000 COVID-19 deaths, is still reporting over 40,000 coronavirus cases per day, taking the total number of infections to over 30.5 million.
